General.Name: EPC Groupe
General.Description: EPC Groupe engages in the manufacture, storage, and distribution of explosives in Europe, Africa, Asia Pacific, and the Americas. The company also provides drilling and mining services; logistics services; and demolition services, including mechanical demolition, deconstruction and blasting of buildings, waste management, and asbestos removal. In addition, it produces 2-ethylhexyl nitrate, a diesel fuel additive that reduces emissions and enhances diesel engine performance. It serves customers operating in the mining, cement, aggregates, civil engineering, and defense industries. EPC Groupe was founded in 1893 and is headquartered in Paris, France. EPC Groupe operates as a subsidiary of Ste E.J. Barbier.
